author: radekkapka
content: Can anyone give me some tips on how to add a custom process to Kurtosis? Do I need to clone and modify `ethereum-package`? I want to run a very simple HTTP server that can be configured with a few flags

author: parithosh
content: yeah you'd need to clone and modify ethereum-package, you can run your local mods by doing `kurtosis run . --args-file=...` and it'll use the local changes. Note we already have `apache` for basic file sharing.

author: pk910
content:
blockscout consists of multiple service containers. The one you're looking at is the api container (which exports port 4000).
To see the frontend, you'll need to use the frontend container which usually exports port 3000:
```
========================================== User Services ==========================================
UUID           Name                                             Ports                                                  Status
cb069eb93ae9   blockscout                                       http: 4000/tcp -> http://127.0.0.1:32810               RUNNING
0ffcd44a4089   blockscout-frontend                              http: 3000/tcp -> http://127.0.0.1:3000                RUNNING
```
